A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The Last Jedi is simply one of the best movies in the Star Wars franchise. Fully taking the film and cemented the franchise for a new audience\, and looking forward to the future over what has come before\, but not disrespecting it as many would seem to believe. TLJ builds on Star Wars' past to create a wealth of new possibility for the series going forward. 

It returns the Force to its' more mystical roots\, sets up a powerful dynamic between Rey and Kylo Ren\, and creates a greater sense of what heroism is\, beyond destiny and legacy. 

The Last Jedi was a risky move\, but undoubtedly one that ultimately pays off and will give franchise scope to go to all kinds of powerful places in the years to come.
